_sText:
Just a basic jailbreak map. Map itself contains knife arena, with buttons which can slay knife fighters. Climb with rotating objects, winners of climb will be teleported to glass box right next to the climb. Yard where is spinning bar of death game. Talent show or spelling contest place at the big brown pillar, red button will make pillar fall to a player under it-->green button raises pillar back to up. Map also contains numerous hidden passages and entity tied weapons. 

On the roof of map is custom AK-47, picker of the ak-47 will get those 5 entity Cts to follow the picker. Last but not for least there are few env_sprite weapons for example. Smoke grenade that will grant blue light sprite to follow picker of smokegrenade.
